form.add_field_instructions_info: Maelekezo haya yatawasilishwa kama tooltip kwa mtumiaji wakati wa kujaza katika uwanda huu.
form.choose_order_message: Chagua na uitishe uwanda ungependa kujumuisha katika hojaji hii.
form.default_date_hint: Ikiwa hakuna tarehe iliyoongezwa, wakati wa sasa wa uchapishaji utaongezwa kwa chaguo-msingi. Mtumiaji bado anaeza kusasisha {{ field_name }} baada ya kuwasilisha chapisho.
form.field_add_other_desc: Inaruhusu kuingiza chaguo maalum ambalo halijaorodheshwa kati ya chaguo zilizo orodheshwa.
form.choose_language: Chagua lugha kwa ajili ya tafsiri

marked_for_internal.body: Kazi hii imewekwa kwa matumizi ya ndani pekee. Haionekani na watumiaji wanapounda chapisho.

survey.internal_use_task: Kazi ni ya matumizi ya ndani pekee
survey.internal_use_task_desc: Kazi hii itaonekana kwa Mtumiaji aliye na ruhusa ya Kusimamia Chapisho pekee.
survey.show_this_task_to: Onyesha kazi hii kwa kila mtu inapochapishwa
survey.show_this_task_to_desc: Wakati jibu la kazi linachapishwa, data kutoka kwa kazi hii itaonyeshwa
survey.title: Anwani
survey.collect_image_caption: Jumuisha uwanda wa manukuu ya picha
survey.disable_caption_field_explanation: Hii italemaza na kuficha manukuu yote yaliopo kwa uwanda huu, lakini unaweza kuwasha tena wakati wowote.
survey.show_task: Onyesha kazi hii kwa kila mtu ikichapishwa
survey.task_info: Unaweza ongeza habari zaidi kwa kila tangazo, kama tafsiri au uthibitisho, na kuwawekea watu kwa kuongeza<nguvu>Kazi</nguvu>. Unaweza chagua kwa zaki zilizoundwa awali au uunde yako kutoka mwanzo.
survey.related_post_info: Tafadhali kumbuka, machapisho yanayohusiana na mahitaji ya kuchapishwa, machapisho ambayo ni "Chini ya ukaguzi" hayataonekana katika matokeo ya utafutaji
survey.location_desc: Eneo la kijiografia lililochaguliwa na ramani
survey.date_desc: Tarehe ikiwa na mwaka, mwezi, siku
survey.datetime_desc: Tarehe ikiwa na masaa na madakika
survey.radio_desc: Ruhusu mtumizi achague tu mojawapo ya seti zilizotambuliwa.
survey.checkbox_desc: Ruhusu mtumizi achague tu mojawapo ya seti zilizotambuliwa.
survey.relation_desc: Unda ushirikiano kati ya hojaji tofautitofauti
survey.video_desc: Huruhusu video za YouTube au Vimeo kupachikwa kwenye chapisho
survey.markdown_desc: Huruhusu matumizi ya sintaksia ya kuashiria kuweka mtindo wa maudhui ya uwanda
survey.require_section: Hitaji kazi hii kukamilishwa kabla ya chapisho kuonekana kwa umma
survey.hide_author_information_desc: Watu walio na ruhusa ya kuhariri majibu pekee ndio wataweza kuona ni nani aliyewasilisha; na tu wakati wa kuzihariri.
survey.hide_location_information_desc: Watu walio na ruhusa ya kuhariri majibu pekee ndio wataweza kuona maeneo mahususi. Watu wengine wataona maeneo yaliyokadiriwa. Mahali papo patakuwa sahihi kwa kilomita {{precision}}.
survey.hide_time_information_desc: Watu walio na ruhusa ya kuhariri majibu pekee ndio wataweza kuona muda mahususi ya uwasilishaji. Wengine wataona tarehe tu.
survey.required_desc: Hitaji kazi hii kukamilishwa kabla ya chapisho kuonekana kwa umma.
survey.require_review: Hitaji machapisho yakaguliwe kabla ya kuchapishwa
survey.require_review_desc: Majibu mapya kwa hojaji hii yatafanyiwa ukaguzi na kwa hivyo hayataonekana mara moja kwa umma. Watumiaji walio na ruhusa ya kukagua jibu wanaeza kukagua na 'kuyachapisha', jambo ambalo litafanya yaonekane na kila mtu
survey.response_private_desc: Watu tu walio na ruhusa ya kuhariri majibu wataweza kuona majibu ya uga huu.
survey.require_task_desc: Hitaji kazi hii kukamilishwa kabla ya chapisho kuonekana kwa umma
survey.only_edit: Watu tu walio na ruhusa ya kuhariri majibu wataweza kuona majibu ya uga huu.
survey.choose_survey_field: Chagua like ambacho kinafaa kugawiwa kwa kila uwanda wa hojaji
survey.choose_survey_field_desc: Kila moja ya nyanda za hojaji zimeorodheshwa hapa chini. Chagua data kutoka kwa {{datasource_type}} ambayo ungependa kutumia kujaza kila nyanda hizo.
survey.who_can_contribute_to_task: Ni nani anayeweza kuchangia nyanda katika kazi hii

delete.desc: <nguvu>Ukifuta hajaji hii</nguvu>, matangazo yake yote pia yatafutwa. Endelea kwa tahadhari.
delete.desc_field: <nguvu>Ukifuta uwanda huu</nguvu>, data zote zilizowekwa ndani pia zitafutwa. Endelea kwa tahadhari.

validation.required: Mashamba yanayohitajika hayapo, mashamba haya yamewekwa alama na *.

targeted_survey.title: Tengeneza hojaji mpya inayolengwa
targeted_survey.description: Tuma maswali kupitia SMS kwenye orodha ya nambari hizo za simu.
targeted_survey.name: Jina la Hojaji
targeted_survey.add_questions_description: Tutatuma kila swali kama SMS tofauti. Baada ya mtu kujibu, tutatuma swali linalofuata katika hojaji.
targeted_survey.question_description: Hivi ndivyo watumiaji watakavyoona watakapoenda kwa hojaji yako.
targeted_survey.sample_question: Swali la mfano: Hujambo! Unajisikiaje leo? Jibu lako ni bure.
targeted_survey.send_to_old_number_warning: Ikiwa unatuma ujumbe kwa nambari ambayo ulituma ujumbe hapo awali, majibu ya mtu huyo yatatumika kwa hojaji ya hivi majuzi kila wakati. Hawataweza tena kujibu maswali ya hojaji ya awali ambayo hayajajibiwa.
targeted_survey.publish_description_many: Tutatuma maswali {{questions}} kwa watu {{numbers}} kupitia SMS kwa jumla ya ujumbe {{total_sms_messages}}. Mtoa huduma wako wa mawasiliano atakutoza kwa kila ujumbe. Tafadhali kuwa mwangalifu kuhusu gharama utakazotumia kwa kutuma hojaji hii. Kitendo hiki hakiwezi kutenduliwa.
targeted_survey.publish_description_one_question: Tutatuma swali {{questions}} kwa watu {{numbers}} kupitia SMS kwa jumla ya ujumbe {{total_sms_messages}}. Mtoa huduma wako wa mawasiliano atakutoza kwa kila ujumbe. Tafadhali kuwa mwangalifu kuhusu gharama utakazotumia kwa kutuma hojaji hii. Kitendo hiki hakiwezi kutenduliwa.
targeted_survey.publish_description_one_number: Tutatuma maswali {{questions}} kwa watu {{numbers}} kupitia SMS kwa jumla ya ujumbe {{total_sms_messages}}. Mtoa huduma wako wa mawasiliano atakutoza kwa kila ujumbe. Tafadhali kuwa mwangalifu kuhusu gharama utakazotumia kwa kutuma hojaji hii. Kitendo hiki hakiwezi kutenduliwa.
targeted_survey.publish_description_one_number_one_quest: Tutatuma swali {{questions}} kwa watu {{numbers}} kupitia SMS kwa jumla ya ujumbe {{total_sms_messages}}. Mtoa huduma wako wa mawasiliano atakutoza kwa kila ujumbe. Tafadhali kuwa mwangalifu kuhusu gharama utakazotumia kwa kutuma hojaji hii. Kitendo hiki hakiwezi kutenduliwa.
targeted_survey.publish_warning: Je, una uhakika ungependa kutuma hojaji hii ya SMS?
targeted_survey.publish_notification_many: Ujumbe {{messages}} itatumwa kama sehemu ya hojaji hii. Utatozwa kwa ujumbe huu na mtoa huduma wako wa mawasiliano ya simu
targeted_survey.publish_notification_one: Ujumbe {{messages}} utatumwa kama sehemu ya hojaji hii. Utatozwa kwa ujumbe huu na mtoa huduma wako wa mawasiliano ya simu
targeted_survey.hide_responders_desc: Nambari ya simu za watu wanaojibu maswali yako husalia kufichwa kutoka kwenye tovuti ya umma. Washiriki wa timu walio na ruhusa za kuhariri pekee ndio wataweza kuziona.
targeted_survey.notification_button: Tazama hojaji katika hali ya data
targeted_survey.description_warning: Lazima utoe maelezo ya hojaji yako.
targeted_survey.send_to_person: Targeted: Tuma hojaji hii kwa mtu{{recipientCount}} kupitia SMS
targeted_survey.send_to_people: Targeted: Tuma hojaji hii kwa watu{{recipientCount}} kupitia SMS
targeted_survey.phone_number_warning: Lazima uweke angalau nambari 1 ya simu.
targeted_survey.one_repeat_alert: Tumeondoa jumla ya nambari {{repeatCount}} za marudio kwenye orodha yako.
targeted_survey.multi_repeat_alert: Tumeondoa jumla ya nambari {{repeatCount}} za marudio kwenye orodha yako.
targeted_survey.multi_number_error: Kati ya nambari {{total}} za simu ulizoweka, tumegundua matatizo {{bad}} kati yao. Tafadhali sahihisha nambari za simu zilizo hapa chini na uendelee. Nambari lazima zilingane na sheria za uumbizaji za nchi iliyochaguliwa.
targeted_survey.one_number_error: Kati ya nambari {{total}} za simu ulizoweka, tumegundua matatizo {{bad}} kati yao. Tafadhali sahihisha nambari ya simu iliyo hapa chini na uendelee. Nambari lazima zilingane na sheria za uumbizaji za nchi iliyochaguliwa.
targeted_survey.phone_number_instructions: Tafadhali andika nambari za simu ambazo ungependa kuwasilana nazo. Lazima uweke koma kati ya kila nambari ya simu.
targeted_survey.targeted_survey_desc: Tumetuma hojaji hii kwa kutumia SMS
targeted_survey.error_message: Hitilafu ilitokea wakati wa kujaribu kuhifadhi hojaji iliolengwa
targeted_survey.error_contacts: Baadhi ya nambari ulizotoa hazikufaulu, tafadhali angalia nambari zako na ujaribu tena

global_filter.unmapped_end: hazijaonyeshwa hapa kwa sababu hazijumuishi maelezo ya eneo.
global_filter.unmapped_none: Hakuna machapisho bila maelezo ya eneo.
global_filter.no_saved_filters: Hakuna vichujio vilivyohifadhiwa. Vichujio vilivyohifadhiwa vitaonekana hapa ili uvichague vikipatikana.

donation.thank_you_for_your_donation_start: Uchumaji wa mapato ya wavuti umewezeshwa kwenye wavuti hii. Shukrani kwa ajili ya mchango wako. Umetoa mchango
donation.web_monetization_text: Upelekaji wa ushahidi sasa umewezeshwa uchumaji wa wavuti. Uchumaji wa mapato ya wavuti ni njia ya kusaidia tovuti unazopenda bila kucheza mchezo wa watangazaji. Unachohitaji ni kupata usanidi wa kivinjari chako. Bofya kiungo hapa chini ili ujifunze jinsi unavyoweza kuchangia.

post.posts_total_map: Kuonyesha {{posts}} ya machapisho {{total_nb}} na maelezo ya eneo kwenye ramani.
post.duplicate_option: Kuna tatizo na usanidi wa uwanja huu kwa sababu ya nakala, tafadhali nenda kwenye mipangilio ya utafiti na uirekebishe.
post.no_search_results: Utafutaji wako haukulingana na tangazo lolote
post.no_search_results_location: Utafutaji wako haukulingana na machapisho yoyote na maelezo ya mahali
post.no_posts_yet_location: Hakuna machapisho na habari ya eneo bado!

locking.lock_broken_by_other: Chapisho lako limefunguliwa. Mabadiliko yako ya sasa ambayo hayajahifadhiwa yatapotea.
locking.locked_message: Chapisho limefungwa kwa sababu {{ user }} analifanyia kazi sasa hivi. Jaribu kuhariri chapisho tofauti.
locking.locked_tooltip: This post is being edited by someone else. Please try again later.

modify.no_task_values: Kwa sasa hakuna thamani zilizohifadhiwa kwa kazi hii.

valid.invalid_state: Tangazo hili kwa sasa siyo halali. Utahitajika kukamilisha kazi zote zinazotakikana kabla ya kuchapisha tangazo. Unaweza ama kukamilisha kazi au kulipa tangazo lako hali tofauti, kama "inatathminiwa"
valid.validation_fail: Mawanda yanayohitajika yanakosekana, mawanda haya yametiwa alama ya * hapa chini.
valid.validation_fail_other: Kulikuwa na kosa la kuthibitisha data. Nyuga zilizoshindwa kuthibitisha zitaonyesha kosa.

author_email.email: Umeingiza anwani batili ya barua pepe

media.error_in_upload: Picha yako ni kubwa mno (kiwango cha juu zaidi ni 1MB) au ina umbizo lisilo sahihi (miundo inayoruhusiwa ni gif, png, jpg na jpeg), tafadhali angalia na ujaribu tena!

video.enter_a_url: Weka URL ya video kutoka Youtube au Vimeo.

add_survey.info: <nguvu>Tangazo hili halijapatiwa hojaji katika utendakazi wako.</nguvu> Hiyo ni kwa sababu iliwasilishwa kupitia {{chanzo}}, ambayo haitoi njia ya mwandishi kuongeza tangazo lao kwa hojaji mahsusi.

editor.name: Jina la Kategoria
editor.slug_help: Ikiachwa wazi, itazalishwa kutokana na jina la kategoria.
editor.roles_help: Majukumu yaliyochaguliwa tu ndiyo yataona kategoria hii.

settings.api_key_desc: Ufunguo wa API ni wa kipekee kwa utumiaji wako, unaweza kutumika kuruhusu mifumo ya wahusika wengine kuingiliana na utendakazi wako wa Ushahidi.
settings.create_open_or_targeted: Unda hojaji wazi au unaolengwa ili kukusanya taarifa kuhusu Ushahidi.
settings.embed_info: Kuunganisha ramani kwa ukurasa mwingine tumia nambari iliyo hapa chini.

settings_list.general_desc: Badilisha jina lako la utendakazi, maelezo, nembo,  na habari nyinginezo.
settings_list.surveys_desc: Unda na ubadilishe hojaji zinazokusanywa na utendakazi wako.
settings_list.data_sources_desc: Badilisha baruapepe, ujumbe, na njia za habari za mtandao wa kijamii zinazosaidia utendakazi wako kukusanya data za hajaji.
settings_list.import_desc: Ingiza data za hojaji kwa utendakazi wako kutoka faili ya CSV.
settings_list.user_settings_desc: Sanidi API yako ili data yako ya Ushahidi iliyotambulishwa iweze kupakiwa kwenye akaunti yako ya Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX).
settings_list.export_desc_hxl: Hamisha data yako kama faili ya CSV au kabidhi vitambulisho na sifa kwa data yako na upakie moja kwa moja kwenye akaunti ya Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) au uhamishe kama faili iliyotambulishwa ya CSV.
settings_list.export_desc: Export all of your data as a CSV file or choose custom fields to export
settings_list.users_desc: Unda na udhibiti watu wanaoweza kuchangia utendakazi wako.
settings_list.roles_desc: Unda na udhibiti aina za idhini watumizi wanazo kwenye utendakazi wako.
settings_list.categories_desc: Unda na udhibiti kategoria ambazo watu wanaweza kutilia matangazo kwa kuimarisha mipangilio.
settings_list.webhooks_desc: Create webhooks that send Ushahidi Platform data to external applications when specific events are triggered.
settings_list.donation_desc: Unda na kusimamia michango ambayo watu wanaweza kufanya kwa shirika lako.

user_settings.user_settings_desc_1: Here you can add your unique API key for your Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) account.
user_settings.user_settings_desc_2: Once set up, this will enable you to upload data directly to a Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) account.
user_settings.user_settings_desc_3: You can find your API key on your Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) profile once you're logged in.
user_settings.view_guide: View the guide to your API key
user_settings.profile_page: Found on your Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) profile page
user_settings.valid_user: A valid maintainer id is required
user_settings.api_key_saved: Ufunguo wa API umehifadhiwa! Sasa unaweza kutambulisha data yako na upakie kwenye akaunti ya Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX).
user_settings.hdx_maintainer_id_min_length: Id ya Mdumishaji wa HDX ni fupi sana
user_settings.api_key_min_length: Ufunguo wa API ni mfupi sana

webhooks.enable_source_destination_desc: Mtandao huu utatumika kwa hojaji za aina zilizochaguliwa pekee.

validation.please_provide_valid_api_url: Tafadhali toa URL halali ya API na http(s)://
validation.secret_key_cannot_be_less_start: Ufunguo wa siri ulioshirikiwa hauwezi chini ya

data_sources.do_you_really_want_to_disconnect: Je, kweli unataka kukata mawasiliano na mtoa huduma wako?
data_sources.associate_with_form_desc: Data yote inayoingia kutoka kwa {{provider}} itatumika kutoa majibu kwa hojaji utakayochagua
data_sources.enable_provider_message: Kubali Hojaji zilizotumwa kwenye chanzo hiki
data_sources.hint_turn_on_off: Unaweza kubadilisha vyanzo vya data, na kisha ufungue na ufunge vyanzo.
data_sources.hint_plugin_needs_configuring: Unatakiwa kubadilisha chanzo hili cha data kabla ya kuiwezesha.
data_sources.unavailable: Chanzo cha data {{thamani}} inapatikana. Boresha mpango wako ili kuipata!

email.incoming_server_port_desc: Common ports: 110 (POP3), 143 (IMAP), 995 (POP3 with SSL), 993 (IMAP with SSL)
email.email_sender_name_desc: Appears in the 'from:' field on outgoing emails

frontline_sms.secret_desc: Set a secret so that only authorized FrontlineCloud accounts can send/recieve message. You need to configure the same secret in the FrontlineCloud Activity.

smssync.intro_step_1: Step 1: Download the 'SMSSync' app from the Android Market.
smssync.intro_step_1_desc: Scan this QR Code with your phone to download the app from the Android Market
smssync.intro_step_2_desc: Turn on SMSSync and use the following link as the Sync URL:
smssync.secret_desc: Set a secret so that only authorized SMSSync devices can send/recieve message. You need to configure the same secret in the SMSSync App.

twilio.phone_nb_desc: The from phone number. A Twilio phone number enabled for the type of message you wish to send.
twilio.account_sid_desc: The unique id of the Account that sent this message.

twitter.intro_step_1:
Step 1: Create a new Twitter application:
Twitter applications may take a few hours or days to be approved by Twitter.
Please be aware of this if you need this data quickly.
twitter.intro_step_2: Step 2: Generate a consumer key and secret
twitter.intro_step_2_desc:
Once you've created the application click on "Keys and Access Tokens".
Then click "Generate Consumer Key and Secret".
Copy keys, tokens and secrets into the fields below.
twitter.consumer_key_desc: Add the consumer key from your Twitter app.
twitter.consumer_secret_desc: Add the consumer secret from your Twitter app.
twitter.access_token_desc: Add the access token you generated for your Twitter app.
twitter.access_token_secret_desc: Add the access secret that you generated for your Twitter app.
twitter.search_terms_desc: Add search terms separated with commas

settings.map_precise_to: When hide location is enabled for a survey, locations will be precise to:
settings.send_targeted: Tuma hojaji inayolengwa kwa kutumia SMS
settings.send_crowdsourced: Rudi kwenye hojaji inayotokana na umati
settings.site_email_note: Tumia tahadhari, hii itaonekana kwa mtu yeyote kwa ukurasa wako.
settings.site_private_desc: Enabling this option makes your deployment and its data only accessible to registered users with the correct privileges, who must sign in for access
settings.site_disable_registration_desc: Kuangalia hii hulemaza kipengele cha usajili. Wasimamizi watalazimika kuongeza watumiaji kwa mikono.
settings.add_first_post_subtitle: Utendakazi ni bure hadi iwe na yaliyomo ndani yake.
settings.invite_people: Au uombe watu wakusaidie kuunda matangazo.

data_import.choose_which_column: Chagua ni kolamu gani ya CSV inafaa kutiwa kwa kila uwanda wa hojaji
data_import.each_survey_field: Kila uwanda wa hojaji umeorodhesha hapa chini. Chagua kolamu kutoka kwa faili ya CSV yako ambayo unependa kutumia kujaza miwanda hiyo.
data_import.status_explanation: Ushahidi inatambua hali tatu ya matangazo: iliyochapishwa, inatathminiwa, na Imehifadhiwa. Hakikisha kuwa kila ulichoweka kwenye kolamu umechagua thamani hizi tatu.
data_import.defined_column: Imefasiliwa na kolamu katika faili yako ya CSV...
data_import.imported_posts_status: Matangazo yaliyoingizwa lazima yawe na hali zao...
data_import.import_error: An error has occurred importing your CSV file.
data_import.complete_info: The data from your CSV spreadsheet, {{filename}}, was successfully imported.
data_import.finish_info: Data kutoka shiti yako ya CSV zingali zinashughulikiwa. Umekaribishwa kutoka kwa ukurasa huu au usubiri hadi shughuli ikamilike. Kwa vyovyote, tutakutaarifu data zako zikiwa tayari.
data_import.configure_explanation: Kupitia mchakato huu unawezapanga thamani zote za nyanja za hojaji ambazo hazikutiwa kwenye ramani katika orodha ya CSV. Thamani hizi zitakuwa sawa kwa matangazo yote yaliyoingizwa.
data_import.import_explanation_csv: Ingiza data kutoka kwa shiti ya CSV kwenye utendakazi wako kama matangazo ya hojaji mahsusi
data_import.import_explanation_file_size: Ukubwa wa faili moja umefungiwa hadi 10 MB
data_import.import_explanation_format_location_1: Maeneo ya kijiografia yanafaa kujumuishwa kama  kolamu ya latitudi na longitudi tofauti katika CSV yako
data_import.import_explanation_required_fields: Mawanda yote inayohitajika lazima ihusishwe na thamani iliyowekwa kwenye CSV. Kwa mfano, ikiwa anuani ya uwanda inahitajima basi uwanda lazima itiwe kwenye ramani katika kolamu ya CSV pale thamani zote zimepangwa
data_import.has_tasks_required_end: , ni pamoja na kazi ambazo kwa kawaida lazima zikamilike kwa kila chapisho kabla ya kuwekwa alama 'kuchapishwa.' Wakati wa kuagiza hii, machapisho yako yote yaliyoagizwa yatakuwa na kazi zao zilizowekwa alama kama 'haijakamilika', wakati bado kuruhusu hali yao kuwekwa alama kama 'kuchapishwa.' Ikiwa unahariri yoyote ya machapisho haya baada ya kuingizwa, hata hivyo, utaulizwa kukamilisha kazi hizo kabla ya kuzichapisha tena.
data_import.organize_your_imported_data: Wekea kolamu za CSV kwa mawanda ya tangazo
data_import.assign_csv_message: Wekea kolamu za CSV kwa mawanda ya tangazo
data_import.csv_instructions: Kila jina la kolamu kutoka faili ya CSV yameorodheshwa. Chagua <nguvu>{{fomu_jina}}</nguvu> uwanda ambao ungepena kila kolamu ingizwe kwayo.
data_import.csv_instructions_required_fields: Uwanda uliowekewa alama ya a [*] inahitajika na lazima iwekewe thamani.

data_export.title: Hamisha data
data_export.description: Hamisha data yako yote kama CSV au uchague nyanja mahususi za hojaji unazotaka kusafirisha.
data_export.description_hxl: Hamisha data yako yote kutoka Ushahidi kama CSV, chagua nyanja mahususi za hojaji ambazo ungependa kuhamisha kama CSV au kukabidhi.
data_export.account: akaunti au upakue kama faili ya CSV 'iliyotambulishwa' kama HXL.
data_export.select_fields_desc: Ikiwa hutaki kuhamisha data yako yote kwa wakati mmoja, unaweza kuchagua sehemu mahususi kutoka kwa kila hojaji kwa ajili ya kusafirisha.
data_export.export_progress:
Uhamishaji unaendelea...

Unaweza kuondoka kwenye ukurasa huu ukitaka. Uhamisho wako utaendelea.

Tutakujulisha tukimaliza.
data_export.no_fields: Lo... unahitaji kuchagua baadhi ya nyanda za kuhamisha kwanza.
data_export.hxl_apikey_alert_1: Inaonekana hujaweka API yako ya Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX). Bila usanidi huu, huwezi kutambulisha data na kupakia kwenye akaunti ya Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX).
data_export.hxl_apikey_alert_2: We strongly advide you set this up now in
data_export.hxl_apikey_alert_3: before continuing as you won't be able to upload your data to HDX
data_export.hxl_title: Kabidhi vitambulisho na sifa zako za HXL, chagua nyanda na uhamishe au upakie
data_export.hxl_desc: Chagua nyanda mahususi kutoka kwa hojaji, kabidhi kitambulisho kwa kila sehemu kisha uchague kugawa sifa nyingi. Hakiki tagi na sifa zako katika onyesho la kukagua kitambulisho.
data_export.hxl_instructions_1: basi unaweza kuchagua kusafirisha nyanda zako zilizotambulishwa kwa faili ya CSV au upakie kwa
data_export.hxl_instructions_3: account that has been set up in
data_export.hxl_instructions_8: kwa maelezo zaidi kuhusu jinsi ya kuchagua vitambulisho na sifa bora za HXL kwa data yako au
data_export.upload_title: Are you ready to upload to an Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) account?
data_export.hdx_csv_title: Are you ready to export to CSV?
data_export.upload_desc:
Umechagua nyanda {{fields}} fza kupakiwa kwenye akaunti ya Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX).

Uligawia vitambulisho na sifa - ili kuangalia, unaweza kurudi nyuma. Ukimaliza, unaweza kuongeza maelezo na kupakia.

Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) inahitaji maelezo machache zaidi ili kupakia kwenye mfumo wao. Utaongeza haya ijayo
data_export.hdx_csv_desc:
Umechagua nyanda {{fields}} za kuhamishia kwenye CSV.

Ulikabidhi vitambulisho na sifa - ili kuangalia hizi ni sahihi, unaweza kurudi nyuma na kuangalia. Ukimaliza, unaweza kuhamisha.
data_export.upload_button: Add dataset details and upload to hdx
data_export.details_desc: To upload to the Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) some extra details are required.
data_export.privacy_desc: You have a choice of sharing your dataset publicly or restricting access to other members of the organisation which owns the dataset.
data_export.private_desc: Private (Only you and other HDX members of your organisation can search, view/edit or download this dataset)
data_export.public_desc: Public (Anyone can search, view/edit or download this dataset)
data_export.dataset_desc: When users search for data on HDX, their search terms will be matched to terms in your title. Avoid using abbreviations in the title which may not be familiar to all users. Also, avoid using words such as current, latest or previous when referring to the time period (e.g Latest 3W) as these terms become misleading as the dataset ages.
data_export.dataset_example: Example dataset title: Who is Doing What Where in Afghanistan, Jan-Dec 2015
data_export.metadata_desc: Metadata is additional information about your dataset that will make it easier for others to understand and put your data into context. Datasets on HDX must include a set of metadata fields.
data_export.uploading_data_desc:
The data upload to your Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) account is in progress...

You can navigate away from this page while this upload happens but please don't close the browser.
data_export.uploading_data_err: Uh oh... Something went wrong when uploading your data, please check the required fields and your api-key and try again.
data_export.no_fields_selected: Hujachagua nyanda zozote au kukabidhi vitambulisho au sifa zozote za hxl. Tafadhali chagua angalau sehemu moja na ukabidhi angalau tagi moja ili kuweza kuhamisha kwa CSV au kupakia kwenye akaunti ya Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX).

validation.all_fields: Please fill in all required fields
